document.full_text: the recovery of citigroup and bank of america provided famed hedge fund managers like lee ainslie and jeff altman some of their biggest gains last year, but now the smart money is getting out while the getting is good.
document.title: smart money: hedge funds sell faltering u.s. banks
lines_and_colors: the recovery of citigroup and bank of america provided famed hedge fund managers like lee ainslie and jeff altman some of their biggest gains last year, but now the smart money is getting out while the getting is good.
